resources.string: Start a new game:\nTap the square to align the tubes.

The following people provided invaluable feedback during the development of this game:
Michael Celey, http://michaelceley.com
Juan Diego Benitez, @jdbntz
Joshua Donlan
Anna Gemmati

Change the default colors to your own.
